msg: EVOLVE COMPLETE: Temporal-LangGraph bridge proven working. Workflow hive-langgraph-1767235889795 COMPLETED in 3m21s with full HIVE cycle. Output: H=6082, I=4899, V=11854, E=13488 chars.

I-PHASE: Created dynamic context manager. scripts/context-manager.ts generates minimal COLD_START_PAYLOAD.md (~35 lines vs static dumps). Auto-regenerates on git commit via husky. npm run context|context:hive|context:compact.

HANDOFF_READY: Silver demo WORKING at localhost:5173. ALL REAL adapters initialized (1eurofilter, rapier2d WASM, xstate@5, mediapipe). CRITICAL BUG: RapierPhysicsAdapter needs position clamping to [0,1] - physics overshoots cause Zod 'too_big' errors. FIX: Add clamp() at line ~197 in rapier-physics.adapter.ts. Demo processes frames despite errors (121 frames, 0.3ms latency). Vite terminal: 3545c022-c0c1-4862-aeb1-69e6d9326e87
